user_question: What are some potential applications of nanotechnology in medicine, and can you generate an image of a futuristic nanobot performing surgery?
final_answer: Nanotechnology in medicine can be used for targeted drug delivery, imaging, and even nanoscale surgeries. Image of a futuristic nanobot performing surgery generated.
